content: Based on 25500 tracks logged since 11 July 2006... I'm into rock, indie, electronic, alternative and experimental, including: The Beatles, Radiohead, Pearl Jam, Nirvana, The Smashing Pumpkins, Led Zeppelin, The American Analog Set, Nine Inch Nails, John Lennon, Four Tet, Kings of Leon, Devendra Banhart, Trent Reznor and Atticus Ross, Arcade Fire, David Bowie, Calexico, Sigur Rós, Björk, Neil Young, Pulp, Rage Against the Machine, Vangelis, Gorillaz, Queens of the Stone Age, Blur, Air, The Flaming Lips, Frank Zappa, Ian Brown, Foo Fighters, Beirut, Jape, Boards of Canada, Maybeshewill, The Redneck Manifesto, Bob Dylan, Grandaddy, Scissor Sisters, The White Stripes, Godspeed You! Black Emperor, Philip Glass, My Bloody Valentine, R.E.M., Pink Floyd, Manu Chao, Jimi Hendrix, Rory Gallagher, Aim, Max Richter, The Smiths. Check out my music taste: http://www.last.fm/user/goodshape
title: Tunes.
author: Michael Flanagan
